title: Who is Selena Quintanilla, and what happened to her? - Quora

response.answer_text: Selena Quintanilla was a famous Latin singer in the 90s. She had songs like La Carcacha, Bidi Bidi Bom Bom, Como La Flor, Dreaming of You etc. On March 31st, 1995, she was shot by her fanclub leader Yolanda Saldivar after Selena came to her motel to collect some missing records or something. Selena threatened to not be friends with Yolanda and took off some ring and thats when Yolanda pulled a gun out and shot her through her chest. Selena ran over to the motel lobby and while she was there, I think she passed there. That's what I know..
